title: Tesla’s Upcoming China-Built Cars, Changes at Wells Fargo Under Scharf
itunes:title: Tesla’s Upcoming China-Built Cars, Changes at Wells Fargo Under Scharf
description:
Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Dana Hull discusses Tesla’s upcoming cars built in China. Jordan Gaspar, co-founder at AccelFoods, talks about managing 35 portfolio brands across a diverse array of categories. Bloomberg News Wall Street Reporter Sonali Basak shares her insight on changes at Wells Fargo under Scharf. And we Drive to the Close with Ryan Nauman, Market Strategist at Informa Financial Intelligence.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Romaine Bostick. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
